description_top: An Arabic alphabet and vocalised syllabary
title: An Arabic alphabet and vocalised syllabary
provenance: The collections of John Greaves, d. 1652 and Thomas Greaves, d. 1676. Purchased by the Bodleian Library in 1678.
record_origin: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.
